text: Do you mean for every time HubDB data was updated? New rows added, cells updated, etc.?
What are you using your data for that would benefit from webhooks? Some external presentation layer or integration?
Yes please, the less curly brackets the better. I'd also kill for a switch/case operator (or case/when in Liquid's case)
Would be awesome if, on publish, we could receive a webhook and then subsequently archive the current state of the DB
Yes, an external integration...so passing data from hubdb to an external platform everytime a hubdb database is published.
